desc: At Adriatiaka Hotel & Residence, we offer the perfect venue for any type of event. Whether it's a conference, a wedding, a business meeting, or a private party, we offer rooms equipped with cutting-edge technology, personalized service, and a welcoming, friendly atmosphere.
lemma: Make your celebration an unforgettable moment!
schedule: Opening hours: Monday to Friday, 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. and 8:00 a.m. to 12:00 p.m.
title: EVENTS AND BANQUETS
